title: Newborn Photography
summary: Gentle, cozy sessions at home to capture those first days.

faqs.a:
Our newborn sessions focus on the quiet, gentle details of your baby’s earliest days. Sessions take place in your home so everything feels calm and comfortable. The time you reserve is dedicated exclusively to your family—Matt (newborn specialist) will arrive during that window with the essentials for a smooth session.

### What we bring
- Newborn wraps and soft fabrics
- Baskets and posing cushions
- Simple headbands and accessories

### How to prepare
- Keep the room warm so baby stays relaxed
- Dress baby in easy-to-remove clothing
- Have a plain, neutral blanket available (optional)
- Feed baby shortly before the session
- Set aside any keepsakes you’d like included

### Including family
Parents and siblings are welcome. Simple, coordinated clothing photographs cleanly and keeps the focus on your baby.

title: Baby / Milestone
summary: Smiles, rolls, first steps, and birthday fun—short milestone sessions at home.

faqs.a:
Our baby and milestone sessions capture your little one’s sweetest moments—from early milestones to special celebrations like birthdays and cake smashes. Sessions take place in your home for a relaxed, comfortable experience. The time you reserve is set aside exclusively for you and your child, and a baby-specialist photographer will arrive during your selected time.

### How to prepare
- Have a plain, light-coloured baby blanket available.
- Choose one or two favourite outfits for your baby.
- Bring a small stuffed toy your child loves.
- Include any hats or headbands you’d like featured.
- For milestone or birthday sessions, please provide your own cake or special items.
- Avoid a bath immediately before the session, as it may make baby sleepy.

### Including family
Older siblings are welcome to participate—dress them in outfits they enjoy and feel comfortable in. Parents can join as well; being photo-ready beforehand is recommended. Coordinated clothing colours help create a clean, cohesive look.

title: Maternity Photography
summary: Elegant portraits celebrating this season of life.

faqs.a:
Our maternity sessions highlight this meaningful and beautiful stage of life. The time you book is reserved specifically for you and your family. A professional photographer will arrive during your selected time and will bring all necessary equipment, including lighting, backdrops, and photography gear.

*Please note:* dresses, props, and accessories are not provided. You’re welcome to bring any gowns, special items, or meaningful pieces you’d like included.

### What to wear
- Flowing dresses, neutral tones, and soft fabrics photograph beautifully.
- Coordinate clothing colours for a soft, cohesive look.
- Choose outfits that feel comfortable and match the mood you want.

We aim to make every maternity session relaxed, joyful, and memorable as you celebrate this important moment in your journey to motherhood.

title: Family Photography
summary: Relaxed, candid sessions outdoors or at home.

faqs.a:
Our family sessions capture genuine connection, natural moments, and the unique personality of your family. Sessions can take place in your home with a professional setup or at an outdoor location of your choice. The time you reserve is dedicated exclusively to your family, and Matt will arrive during your selected time with all necessary photography equipment.

### How to prepare
- Coordinate clothing in complementary colours or tones for a polished look.
- Choose outfits that are comfortable and reflect your family’s style.
- Have meaningful items ready if you’d like them included (blankets, books, small keepsakes).
- If outdoors, bring comfortable shoes and consider layers for changing weather.
- For in-home sessions, lightly tidy the area we’ll use so the focus stays on your family.

### Including children and pets
Kids are encouraged to be themselves—bringing a favourite toy or small comfort item can help them feel relaxed. Pets are welcome in your portraits too; have treats or accessories ready if you want them included.

title: Graduation Photography
summary: Cap-and-gown and editorial-style portraits to celebrate your achievement.

faqs.a:
Our graduation sessions celebrate this important achievement with polished, professional portraits that highlight your personality and accomplishments. Sessions can take place in your home, on campus, or at a location of your choice. The time you reserve is dedicated exclusively to you, and Matt will arrive during your selected time with all essential photography equipment.

### How to prepare
- Wear your gown, stole, cap, or any academic regalia you’d like featured.
- Choose an additional outfit that reflects your personal style.
- Bring meaningful items (diplomas, medals, textbooks, symbols of your field).
- Steam or smooth your gown for a clean, polished look.
- If outdoors, consider comfortable shoes for walking between locations.

### Including family & friends
Family and loved ones are welcome to join. Coordinated or complementary colours create a cohesive look. Being photo-ready before Matt arrives keeps the session smooth and ensures time for both individual and group portraits.

title: Engagement
summary: Romantic sessions in meaningful locations with natural, guided posing.

faqs.a:
Our wedding and engagement sessions are designed to highlight your connection, joy, and story. The time you reserve is set aside specifically for you. A professional photographer will arrive during your selected time with all essential equipment (lighting and photography gear). Backdrops are available upon request.

You’re welcome to bring meaningful items you’d like included—rings, signs, champagne, blankets, or other sentimental details.

### How to prepare
- Coordinate outfits in complementary colours.
- Choose clothing that matches the style and mood you want.
- Bring comfortable shoes if you’ll be walking outdoors.
- Include any personal or symbolic items that reflect your relationship.

We aim to keep every session fun, relaxed, and memorable—capturing genuine moments that reflect your love, excitement, and the significance of this chapter together.
